title: VSCode Extension Changelog | Labuladong Algo Notes
content:
VSCode Extension Changelog

labuladongOriginalAbout 767 words

VSCode Extension Changelog

labuladongOriginalAbout 767 words
labuladong labuladong labuladong Original About 767 words About 767 words

Info

This page is the update log for the VSCode plugin. For detailed instructions, see the VSCode Plugin Guide.

v3.2.1

v3.1.3

v3.1.0

Major Update

Supports local debugging for Java/C++/Python/JavaScript/Golang algorithm code. For detailed setup, see the VSCode Plugin Guide.

3.0.5

3.0.0

v2.0.4

v2.0.3

v2.0.2

v2.0.0

Breaking Change

VSCode now exclusively uses the curl command for logging into LeetCode accounts. For detailed instructions, see the VSCode Plugin Guide.

Please use mainstream browsers like Chrome/Edge to copy the curl command, as developer tools in less common browsers might be inadequate, leading to incorrect curl commands.

2024/6/29

Significant Improvement

Substantially enhanced the accuracy of multilingual solutions.

2024/6/25

Bug Fix

Resolved an issue where outdated course links were referenced in the plugin's thought process. To update, follow the steps in the VSCode Plugin Guide and re-fetch the data.

v1.5.6

Optimized the speed of data retrieval for the plugin.

v1.5.5

Supported New Website Subscription.

v1.5.4

Major Bug Fix

The update addresses a problem where network requests were blocked due to Cloudflare protection on the English version of leetcode.com, preventing normal login and use.

v1.5.3

v1.5.1

Breaking Change

Discontinued support for XiaoeTong and the old website, adapting to the new site labuladong.online. The method to unlock course-specific solutions in the plugin has changed, with details in the first chapter of the course.

Major Update

Added an "Edit" button to the visual panel, allowing users to modify their solution code and run it directly on the panel for easy verification of creative ideas:

v1.4.5

v1.4.3

v1.4.2

v1.4.0

Major Update

Support for algorithm code visualization:

v1.3.3

v1.3.2
